original: @160a * // 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i mtshan ma can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @160a * // 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i mtshan ma can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one who bears the mark of victory over the three worlds.🔽The lord of sages, with the marks and signs, the sugata with a thousand petals,

original: thub dbang mtshan ltas bde gshegs me tog 'dab stong dang // bdag nyid chen po'i padma 'dab brgya phrag mtshon pa //
analyzed: thub dbang mtshan ltas bde gshegs me tog 'dab stong dang // bdag nyid chen po'i padma 'dab brgya phrag mtshon pa //
translated: the great being with a hundred petals,

original: skal bzang rgyal ba byang chub phyogs brgya'i lha tshogs can //
analyzed: skal bzang rgyal ba byang chub phyogs brgya'i lha tshogs can //
translated: the fortunate victor, with a retinue of deities of the thirty-two marks,

original: chos 'chad phyag dbus g-yas g-yon sdong bu mdzes rgyas mdud //
analyzed: chos 'chad phyag dbus g-yas g-yon sdong bu mdzes rgyas mdud //
translated: expounding the Dharma, with right and left hands beautiful and full,

original: skal pa bzang pos snga dro'i dus //
analyzed: skal pa bzang pos snga dro'i dus //
translated: in the morning,

original: dben pa'i gnas su mandal bri //
analyzed: dben pa'i gnas su mandal bri //
translated: in a secluded place, draw a maṇḍala,

original: rin chen khri bkod padmo'i steng //
analyzed: rin chen khri bkod padmo'i steng //
translated: on a jeweled throne, on a lotus seat,

original: rgyal dang de sras rin chen bzhugs //
analyzed: rgyal dang de sras rin chen bzhugs //
translated: the victor and his sons, seated on jewels,

original: bstod dbyangs sngon du 'gro pas mchod //
analyzed: bstod dbyangs sngon du 'gro pas mchod //
translated: with praise and music, make offerings,

original: rkang pas bro brdung lag gar bsgyur //
analyzed: rkang pas bro brdung lag gar bsgyur //
translated: with foot-stamping, hand gestures,

original: se gol gtogs pas spyi gtsug gzhag / khrus gsol de nas rgyan sogs dbul //
analyzed: se gol gtogs pas spyi gtsug gzhag / khrus gsol de nas rgyan sogs dbul //
translated: and snapping fingers, place it on the crown of one's head, and then offer ablutions and ornaments.

original: mchod pa lnga dang ldan pa yi //
analyzed: mchod pa lnga dang ldan pa yi //
translated: With the five offerings,

original: gtor ma chen po dbul byas la //
analyzed: gtor ma chen po dbul byas la //
translated: offer the great bali,

original: rol mo dang ni bdug par bcas //
analyzed: rol mo dang ni bdug par bcas //
translated: with music and incense,

original: lan grangs nyi shu gcig bskor bya //🔽me tog du mas bkang ba yi //
analyzed: lan grangs nyi shu gcig bskor bya // me tog du mas bkang ba yi //
translated: And turn it twenty-one times.🔽With four excellent vases

original: bum pa bzang po bzhi bcas te /
analyzed: bum pa bzang po bzhi bcas te /
translated: Filled with many flowers,

original: ba dan dmar po bzhi mtshan la //
analyzed: ba dan dmar po bzhi mtshan la //
translated: Marked with four red banners,

original: me tog snod bzhis kha rab brgyan //
analyzed: me tog snod bzhis kha rab brgyan //
translated: And well adorned with four flower bowls,

original: phreng ba spel legs mdzes pa la //
analyzed: phreng ba spel legs mdzes pa la //
translated: With a beautiful garland of alternating flowers,

original: yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags btab nas //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags btab nas //
translated: Incanted with the mantra of the wish-fulfilling jewel,

original: g-yas su 'khyil pa la sogs dung //
analyzed: g-yas su 'khyil pa la sogs dung //
translated: Such as a conch with clockwise whorls,

original: snod bzung dal bus dor bar bya //
analyzed: snod bzung dal bus dor bar bya //
translated: And slowly cast them.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal mtshan //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal mtshan //
translated: Having invited the banner of victory over the three worlds

original: ri dbang rtse nas spyan drangs te //
analyzed: ri dbang rtse nas spyan drangs te //
translated: From the peak of Mount Meru,

original: bdag lus mchod sbyin byas nas su//
analyzed: bdag lus mchod sbyin byas nas su//
translated: And made an offering of one's own body,

original: sems ni sku la bstim par bya //🔽rdo rje'i sku mdog 'od bzang mkhregs //
analyzed: sems ni sku la bstim par bya // rdo rje'i sku mdog 'od bzang mkhregs //
translated: One should dissolve the mind into the body.🔽The vajra body, with excellent radiant light,

original: thub dbang ring bsrel do shal thogs //
analyzed: thub dbang ring bsrel do shal thogs //
translated: Endowed with a garland of relics of the lord of sages,

original: gzhon nu'i cha lugs gar mkhan tshul //
analyzed: gzhon nu'i cha lugs gar mkhan tshul //
translated: With the attire of a youth, like a dancer,

original: pi wang lhan cig dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: pi wang lhan cig dgyes pa'o //
translated: Together with a vīṇā, is delighted.

original: ye shes can las ye shes sku //
analyzed: ye shes can las ye shes sku //
translated: The jñānakāya from the one with wisdom,

original: gzhan sprul bum bzang dpag tu med /
analyzed: gzhan sprul bum bzang dpag tu med /
translated: With other emanations, countless excellent vases,

original: thogs nas dri mchog khrus gsol zhing ;
analyzed: thogs nas dri mchog khrus gsol zhing ;
translated: Having taken them, one should bathe with supreme fragrance.

original: / me tog snying pos mchod char dbab //
analyzed: / me tog snying pos mchod char dbab //
translated: Flower Essence, rain down offerings!

original: phyogs bzhi nas ni dam tshig can //
analyzed: phyogs bzhi nas ni dam tshig can //
translated: From the four directions, those who are faithful

original: sngags pa lhub lhub gos gyon nas //
analyzed: sngags pa lhub lhub gos gyon nas //
translated: and wear the robes of the mantra practitioner,

original: rol mo dbyangs dang lhan cig pas //
analyzed: rol mo dbyangs dang lhan cig pas //
translated: together with the sounds of music,

original: me tog sna tshogs char dbab po //
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs char dbab po //
translated: rain down various flowers.🔽Oṃ āḥ hrīḥ vajra jñāna viśuddha mahā viṇi pūlladhara

original: aom a'a:hr'i:badzra dzny'a n'a bi shuddha ma h'a bi na bi phulla dha ra /🔽sarba tv'arth'a mam sarba k'a ya w'a ka tsitt'a @160b p'a pam a'a pa ra na sho dha ya /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i:badzra dzny'a n'a bi shuddha ma h'a bi na bi phulla dha ra / sarba tv'arth'a mam sarba k'a ya w'a ka tsitt'a @160b p'a pam a'a pa ra na sho dha ya /
translated: sarva tvaṃ sarva kāya vāka citta pāpaṃ aparāṇa śodhaya

original: sho dha ya /
analyzed: sho dha ya /
translated: śodhaya🔽bhara bhara🔽saṃbhara saṃbhara

original: bha ra bha ra /🔽sam bha ra sam bha ra /🔽sam ha ra /🔽a'a k'arsha ya /
analyzed: bha ra bha ra / sam bha ra sam bha ra / sam ha ra / a'a k'arsha ya /
translated: saṃhara🔽ākṛṣaya

original: a'a k'arsha ya /
analyzed: a'a k'arsha ya /
translated: ākṛṣaya

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ga rbhe dzva la h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ga rbhe dzva la h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: sarva tathāgata hṛdaya garbha jvalā hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Then, with whatever wealth and resources one has, one should make offerings and, taking the flowers with respect, scatter them throughout the entire environment.

original: de nas gang bdog 'byor pa rnams kyis bsti stang bya ba dang // gus pas me tog blangs nas spyod yul kun la khyab bar gtor //
analyzed: de nas gang bdog 'byor pa rnams kyis bsti stang bya ba dang // gus pas me tog blangs nas spyod yul kun la khyab bar gtor //
translated: Then, one should make offerings to the guru and the Three Jewels with the following words:🔽 Oṃ. I offer this excellent flower garland to the Bhagavān and his retinue.🔽 Please accept it and grant me the supreme and common accomplishments.🔽 Oṃ. I offer this excellent incense to the Bhagavān and his retinue.🔽 Please accept it and grant me the supreme and common accomplishments.🔽 Oṃ. I offer this excellent light to the Bhagavān and his retinue.🔽 Please accept it and grant me the supreme and common accomplishments.🔽 Oṃ. I offer this excellent perfume to the Bhagavān and his retinue.🔽 Please accept it and grant me the supreme and common accomplishments.🔽 Oṃ. I offer this excellent food to the Bhagavān and his retinue.🔽 Please accept it and grant me the supreme and common accomplishments.🔽 Oṃ. I offer this excellent music to the Bhagavān and his retinue.🔽 Please accept it and grant me the supreme and common accomplishments.🔽 Oṃ. I offer this excellent dance to the Bhagavān and his retinue.🔽 Please accept it and grant me the supreme and common accomplishments.🔽 Oṃ. I offer this excellent song to the Bhagavān and his retinue.🔽 Please accept it and grant me the supreme and common accomplishments.🔽 Oṃ. I offer this excellent cloth to the Bhagavān and his retinue.

original: snying po mchog nyid shing lo'i ga pur gzhag cing dri bzang byug / de yi khrus chab bdag gdong bkru bgo thams cad bsgrub //
analyzed: snying po mchog nyid shing lo'i ga pur gzhag cing dri bzang byug / de yi khrus chab bdag gdong bkru bgo thams cad bsgrub //
translated: The best essence is camphor in a leaf, and one should anoint with perfume.🔽The bathing water is for washing one's face, and all the distribution is accomplished.

original: me tog la brten pa'i sgrub thams rdzogs so//
analyzed: me tog la brten pa'i sgrub thams rdzogs so//
translated: The practice based on flowers is complete.
